item.description:
By the Way: For those of you that want to rough it or if we fill up the main lodge and you still want to join us, there is plenty of room on the grounds for tent camping...as many as 110 +

So if camping out is your preference, there is plenty of room to pitch a tent or sleep in one of the Adirondacks. Each Adirondack accomodates up to 4 people in sleeping bags.

Here is a link with some more details about the lower camp.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Wilton Weekend Dog & Peeps Overnight Adventure - Sleeping under the Stars
